data.message: Loose cannon! So he's supporting Clinton that cheated sanders, receives money from Saudi Arabia that tortures and executes women and gays on a daily basis, and is the author of the policy that slaughtered 100,000 Africans in Libya. Okay. Lucifer much?

replies.message: Just because he insulted Trump doesn't mean he likes Hillary. You can insult one candidate and still not like the other. Moron.

Really? No shit sherlock. That's why I asked the question. If he can't see the difference, not unlike you, then he deserves to be told the truth. It's obvious that you and people like that has been rapper don't understand the difference between a buffoon, and a neocon warmonger. If one is criticized but not the other, then it is an obvious inference of support, son.
Ya except he's been dissing Hillary since bill was president...
You're probably right, Ryan. We'll wait for the new hillary diss...
